summary: The 'Promoting American Competition in Aquaculture Research Act' amends the National Agricultural Research, Extension, and Teaching Policy Act of 1977. It eliminates the prohibition on indirect costs associated with aquaculture assistance programs and reauthorizes these programs. Specifically, it allocates $15 million annually from 2025 through 2029. The bill also clarifies how indirect cost limitations apply to these awards, referencing sections 1462 and 1473 of the existing act.
